results.description: Jake Livermore scores the winner as West Brom stay top of the Championship with a resilient victory over in-form Hull City.
results.shortTitle: Livermore winner keeps Baggies top
results.title: Hull City 0-1 West Bromwich Albion: Jake Livermore goal keeps Baggies top

results.description: West Bromwich Albion ease back to the top of the Championship table as they comfortably see off managerless Stoke City.
results.shortTitle: Baggies beat managerless Stoke to go top
results.title: Stoke City 0-2 West Bromwich Albion: Slaven Bilic's Baggies win to go top

results.description: Former England midfielder Gareth Barry rejoins West Bromwich Albion on a deal until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: West Brom re-sign midfielder Barry
results.title: Gareth Barry: West Bromwich Albion re-sign ex-England midfielder

results.description: Reaction as West Bromwich Albion beat the Championship's bottom side Stoke City to move back to the top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: West Brom go top of Championship after beating Stoke
results.title: Championship live: West Bromwich Albion beat managerless Stoke City

results.description: The body of Rob Spray has been returned to the UK and a coroner is now investigating how he died.
results.shortTitle: Dead England fan's family awaiting test results
results.title: England fan's family awaiting test results after Bulgaria death

results.description: Former Scotland midfielder James Morrison retires from playing at age 33 to take an academy coaching role with West Bromwich Albion.
results.shortTitle: Former Scotland midfielder Morrison retires at 33
results.title: James Morrison: Former Scotland midfielder retires from playing at 33

results.description: Charlton Athletic score a stoppage-time penalty to deny 10-man Championship leaders West Bromwich Albion victory.
results.shortTitle: Charlton deny 10-man leaders West Brom
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 2-2 Charlton Athletic: Baggies held with 10 men

thumbnail.altText: Darnell Furlong in action for West Brom

results.description: Gareth Barry's return to West Bromwich Albion following his release in June is delayed by a potential payment to previous club Everton.
results.shortTitle: Everton clause delays Barry's WBA return
results.title: Gareth Barry: Everton clause delays West Brom's attempt to re-sign veteran midfielder

results.description: The Championship's bottom club Barnsley go 2-0 up at The Hawthorns before leaders West Bromwich Albion hit back to draw.
results.shortTitle: Baggies come from behind to hold Barnsley
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 2-2 Barnsley: Baggies come from 2-0 down to draw

thumbnail.altText: West Bromwich Albion celebrate a goal

results.description: Rob Spray died in Sofia a week ago but his family say they still do not know how he died.
results.shortTitle: Family of dead England fan 'left in limbo'
results.title: England fan Rob Spray death: Family 'left in limbo'

results.description: West Bromwich Albion stay top of the Championship table after substitute Hal Robson-Kanu's late winner at Middlesbrough.
results.shortTitle: West Brom stay top after late Robson-Kanu goal
results.title: Middlesbrough 0-1 West Bromwich Albion: Baggies stay top of the Championship

results.description: West Bromwich Albion announce plans to pay tribute to fan Rob Spray, who died before England's Euro 2020 qualifier in Bulgaria.
results.shortTitle: Baggies to 'salute' fan who died in Sofia
results.title: Rob Spray: West Bromwich Albion plan tribute to England fan who died in Sofia

results.description: Former Wales striker Hal Robson-Kanu extends his contract with West Bromwich Albion until the summer of 2021.
results.shortTitle: Robson-Kanu extends West Brom deal
results.title: Hal Robson-Kanu: Former Wales striker extends West Brom contract until 2021

thumbnail.altText: Hal Robson-Kanu in action for West Brom

results.description: About 10,000 has been raised for the family of Rob Spray, who died ahead of the Bulgaria match.
results.shortTitle: Family of England fan who died in Sofia 'broken'
results.title: Family of England fan Rob Spray who died in Sofia 'broken'

results.description: The former West Bromwich Albion and England forward, who died last year, was an inspiration to black players.
results.shortTitle: Cyrille Regis inducted into football Hall of Fame
results.title: Cyrille Regis inducted into football's Hall of Fame

results.description: The EFL and their charity partner Mind are using street art in a bid to encourage conversations about mental health.
results.shortTitle: EFL and Mind launch street art campaign
results.title: World Mental Health Day: Street art campaign launched by English Football League

results.description: West Bromwich Albion move top of the Championship as they hold off a late Cardiff City comeback at The Hawthorns.
results.shortTitle: Baggies move top after beating Bluebirds
results.title: West Bromwich Albion 4-2 Cardiff City: Baggies move top after beating Bluebirds

results.description: Ezgjan Alioski scores the only goal as Leeds end West Brom's unbeaten start and replace them at the top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Leeds beat Albion to replace them at top
results.title: Leeds United 1-0 West Bromwich Albion: Ezgjan Alioski goal sends Leeds top

thumbnail.altText: Ezgjan Alioski of Leeds United scores a goal to make it 1-0 against West Brom

results.description: West Brom boss Slaven Bilic compares Nathan Ferguson to England's Declan Rice after his goal helps them beat QPR and go top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Bilic hails 'new Rice' as West Brom go top
results.title: Queens Park Rangers 0-2 West Bromwich Albion: Ferguson and Pereira give Baggies win

results.description: Former Scotland midfielder James Morrison says he has "a big decision to make" because of the lack of attractive offers after his West Bromwich Albion exit.
results.shortTitle: Morrison hints at retirement
results.title: James Morrison: Former Scotland midfielder hints at retirement after lack of offers
